name: Light My Way VR
description:
Two ghosts, a child and a mage, find each other lost in the depths of a mysterious forest. Deciding to work together they begin their journey, using their distinct skills to cross safely through the woods. 

The Mage:

  • Has a protection spell, so the enemies within the woods do not affect him.
  • Carries a lantern to light the way.
  • Uses his magic to help bring the platforms close to the child and spook enemies away.

The Child:

  • Must collect light spirits to keep the mage’s lantern and magic working. 
  • Should remain close to the light. 
  • Helps collect items in small places the mage cannot reach. 

“Light My Way” is a virtual reality cooperative local multiplayer platformer game where the players must work together to find a way out of danger. The idea behind the development of this game was to explore a multiplayer dynamic while the players are using simultaneously a VR headset and PC.
